ForearmsCBReverseWristCurl.name: Cable Reverse Wrist Curl
ForearmsCBReverseWristCurl.preparation: Sit and grasp cable bar with narrow to shoulder width overhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees.
ForearmsCBReverseWristCurl.execution: Raise stirrup by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.
ForearmsCBReverseWristCurl.comments: Do not allow elbows to rise.

ForearmsCBOneArmReverseWristCurl.name: Cable One Arm Reverse Wrist Curl
ForearmsCBOneArmReverseWristCurl.preparation: Sit and grasp cable stirrup. Rest forearm on thigh with palm facing down and with wrist just beyond knee.
ForearmsCBOneArmReverseWristCurl.execution: Raise stirrup by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.
ForearmsCBOneArmReverseWristCurl.comments: Do not allow elbow to rise. Hand may be placed under wrist (as demonstrated) to offer stability and to maintain horizontal orientation of forearm.

ForearmsCBRollerWristExtention.name: Cable Roller Wrist Extension
ForearmsCBRollerWristExtention.preparation: Stand behind weight plate(s) on floor and grasp wrist roller handle with both hands over hand grip.
ForearmsCBRollerWristExtention.execution: With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip in front of handle (by flexing wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and hyperextend right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement.
ForearmsCBRollerWristExtention.stabilizers: trapeziusupper, levatorscapulae, wristflexors, brachioradialis, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior
